info.name: GraphQL API - 04. Master Data Management
info.description:
# 04. Master Data Management

Master data for assets, work orders, manufacturers, and vendors

## 🔐 Authentication
1. Import `GraphQL-Environment.postman_environment.json`
2. Set `{{graphql_url}}` in environment
3. Run login/signup from Authentication collection
4. Tokens are automatically saved and used

## 📊 APIs in this collection
- **Queries**: 24
- **Mutations**: 36

## 🔗 Related Collections
This is a focused collection for 04. Master Data Management. For complete API reference, see the master collection.
